svg.text: • True zero-copy data sharing • Unified Polaris catalog • Direct customer access
• Supports structured + unstructured data • Real-time updates • Customer-controlled queries
• Enables natural language interface • Industrial AI tools integration
❌ Multiple data pipelines • Multiple sources of truth • High maintenance • Performance bottlenecks
• Fredrik (Cognite Head of Data Integration) - Technical assessment needed
• Exxon - Driving customer, validation required • Conference - Partnership announcement target
• Development - Spark code analysis, native app prototype, Snowflake account setup
